mapper.insert: insert into pdm_ortho_product_info (product_id, ortho_product_name, image_geo, ortho_product_directory, producer, geographic_info, satellite, sensor, resolution, image_breath, center_time, size_of_tif, client_name, deliever_name, deliever_time, receive_station, receive_time, swing_satellite_angle, cloud_percent, width_in_meters, height_in_meters, product_quality, bands, center_longitude, center_latitude) values (#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orthoProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageGeo,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{orthoProductDirectory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{producer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geographicInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{satellite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resolution,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{imageBreath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{centerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sizeOfTif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delieverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delieverTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{swingSatelliteAngle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cloudPercent,jdbcType=REAL}, #{widthInMeters,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{heightInMeters,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{productQuality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bands,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{centerLongitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{centerLatitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.select: select product_id, ortho_product_name, image_geo, ortho_product_directory, producer, geographic_info, satellite, sensor, resolution, image_breath, center_time, size_of_tif, client_name, deliever_name, deliever_time, receive_station, receive_time, swing_satellite_angle, cloud_percent, width_in_meters, height_in_meters, product_quality, bands, center_longitude, center_latitude from pdm_ortho_product_info
